Name: Double
About the game: Double is an action-quest game telling about a fight with a mental disorder by immersing in dreams. Choose your way and find out how this mystical story ends. Carlos stays in a mental asylum and tries to overcome his post-war syndrome. Every day he must make a decision: continue his treatment or surrender to illusions. Key features: Non-linear story that forces to make decisions in hard and ambiguous situations. Connection between dreams and reality. As time passes, the invasiveness of dreams into reality keeps growing. Original soundtrack that will blow you away. For Support and Bug reports, email us at tomatofantasygames@gmail.com
